item.title: CVE-2021-3100|2024-09-16T16:48:29.903Z -- amazon%20web%20services -- log4j-cve-2021-44228-hotpatch
item.description: The Apache Log4j hotpatch package before log4j-cve-2021-44228-hotpatch-1.1-13 didnâ€™t mimic the permissions of the JVM being patched, allowing it to escalate privileges.
